option1.title: Characters
option1.content: People, animals, creatures, or objects in the story

option1.title: Setting
option1.content: Where and when the story takes place

option1.title: Conflict
option1.content: Problem in the story that the characters must solve

option1.title: Rising Action
option1.content: Events leading up to the climax

option1.title: Climax
option1.content: Most intense moment of the story

option1.title: Resolution
option1.content: Problem has been solved and story is resolved

option2.title: Conflict
option2.content: The problem or struggle between opposing forces; the main problem that the characters try to solve.

option2.title: Rising Action
option2.content: The part of the story that builds suspense as the characters move closer to resolving the conflict.

option2.title: Climax
option2.content: The most exciting or emotional part of the story; usually the turning point that changes the characters' fate.

option2.title: Falling Action
option2.content: The part of the story that occurs after the climax as the characters and story work to a resolution.

option2.title: Resolution
option2.content: The outcome of the story when the conflict is resolved and the story is finished.
